function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Residential cooking as a substantial source of indoor air pollutants leading to respiratory problems","Impact":"Health risks for occupants, especially those with respiratory issues","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, using air purifiers, and promoting proper cooking practices","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and monitoring devices for air quality","People":"Household occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building occupants, facility managers, and cooking equipment manufacturers"},{"Description":"Effects of ergonomics on musculoskeletal disorders in office spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of musculoskeletal disorders for office workers","Mitigation":"Implementing ergonomic design principles, providing adjustable furniture, and promoting regular movement","Technologies":"Adjustable desks, ergonomic chairs, and posture monitoring devices","People":"Office workers, employers, and workplace health and safety professionals","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, and workplace health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Relation between IEQ (Indoor Environmental Quality) and fatigue, tiredness, headaches, and attention/focus in office and educational buildings","Impact":"Decreased productivity and impaired learning due to poor indoor environmental quality","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, regulating temperature and humidity, and reducing noise levels","Technologies":"HVAC systems, noise insulation, and air quality sensors","People":"Office workers, students, and educators","Owner":"Building operators, educational institutions, and employers"}]}
